headline.main: Koop, Parting, Reviews A Contentious Tenure

byline.original: By MARTIN TOLCHIN, Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Dr. C. Everett Koop offered his valedictory today after eight years as Surgeon General of the United States, describing how he transformed an ''emasculated'' public office with little official authority into a bully pulpit for health.
